title: Conjure Barrage

Conjure Barrage Information

Description: Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Cone Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save
